HuggingMouse.visualizers¶

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

VisualizerDimReduction

Class for visualizing trial averaged data in 3D with
class HuggingMouse.visualizers.VisualizerDimReduction(dim_reduction_model)¶

Class for visualizing trial averaged data in 3D with a dimensionality reduction model provided to the constructor. The dimensionality reduction model can be any model that adheres to the sklearn decomposition or manifold API (fit_transform method).

info()¶
visualize(trial_averaged_data, session, stimulus)¶
